resources.string:
Select an approach to detect a remote device


Discovers devices propose to search a devices at proximity (same WIFI or Bluetooth).


Bounded devices present a list of bounded devices.


Scan QRCode propose to connect two devices with an image with black and white dot (QRCode). One device present the QRCode, the other scan the code.


Scan NFC propose to use the Near field Communication.


Send SMS propose to receive an SMS from a remote device.


Music propose to receive a sound from a remote device.


Enter ID propose to create a short identification for the current connection in the remote device. You must enter this id with the keyboard to initiate the communication.
Discover the devices if they are connected in the same WIFI network or have the bluetooth activated. Then, select one discovered device to connect and/or pairing.
Receive an SMS to remote device.
Wait a SMS from a remote device.
Listen a sound with the connection informations.
Impossible to access Internet to generate a ticket.
Impossible to access Internet to check the ticket.
Invalid ticket. Check case and try again.
Enter published id from remote device.
